Renaissance type looking. Long sleeves over hands.

This shirt was just what I needed for my pirate outfit for the renaissance festival! The quality is super good and the material for the torso is stretchy. I’m 5ft 2in and 125lbs and a size small fit me perfectly. The material is also not too sheer, but I would recommend wearing a white or skin color bra underneath. The design is just as it’s pictured! It’s well worth the price for sure! I had also ordered this the last minute and was worried it wouldn’t come in time but it shipped super fast!
The sleeves feel just a little short. And the length of the shirt was borderline.

I bought this thinking it would be a thicker material than it is. In a way, i'm pleasantly surprised its more lightweight since I get hot easily. But on the other hand, the bust area is incredibly sheer. You NEED a white bra to wear it. Its also got this stretchy material on the torso that really does nothing but ride up on me. Still, its gorgeous, and I still manage to wear it decently often despite its flaws!

I ordered a black top, but got a white top in an Amazon returned bag. Got this shirt for my daughter, so when I showed the white one I thought for sure she was going to be mad. In the end she told me that it looked good and she would wear it. The negative thing about the white top is that it needs ironing (which I can do, but hate doing it every week) and it is a little see through.

评论概述: Two different fabrics - not color matched either
评论详情: It’s too bad because it was kind of cute and fit well (on the loose side I would say, if anything) but it is made out of two totally different fabrics that will need different care, breathe differently, etc. and on top of that the color tones of the two different fabrics were perceptibly different. The waist panel in front and the entire back panel were a ticket stretchy polyester fabric versus the rest was a zero stretch semi-sheer cotton-poly. Just wasn’t what I was expecting and I didn’t care for the look
The material feels cheap and it arrived crumpled, wrinkled and creased. It just was not flattering at all.

Luckily I got this to wear under some corset tops/vests I am making, because it is a bit sheer. Works well as part of a fantasy or medieval outfit. Was easy to clean. Do beware the sleeves are a tad bit poofier than I expected, which is why its maybe not as flattering as I had hoped.

评论概述: Pretty, but not enough natural fiber for comfort
评论详情: I bought a romantic sleeveless dress and wanted this blouse to wear under.  When this arrived, I could see and feel that the fabric was a little too stiff and not flowing.  The body is made with lycra, which makes it snug and pretty comfortable to wear.  I was just looking for something that was going to soften with time, and have more natural drape.  This pattern made out of a washed linen would be amazing.  I'm keeping it because I washed it already.  Going to give it to a smaller friend, since it did shrink a bit.  It's pretty.  Too bad it's just not the right fabrication for me.  I should have read the contents more closely. :)

I see the sewing totally issued the fabric from the inside. I feel the shirt is very comfortable and the pretty cuffs don’t get in the way. I pushed them up to my elbows and it stayed. I may order another as I really want my costume to be perfect.

评论概述: Fit just right after minor alterations
评论详情: I needed an XS but Small was the closest I could get. The waist fit fine but the top was too baggy (I'm an A cup). I borrowed a friend's sewing machine and took it in at the top and around the collar. The stretchy material is comfortable and even after I made the collar smaller it can still stretch over my head with no trouble. The seams are good quality and are holding together well.

评论概述: Really Well-Made...SO wanted to like this
评论详情: This blouse was really well made. The bodice is double thick so doesn't show through like many white shirts and has just enough stretch to make it both comfortable and well fitted. I really really wanted to like and keep this shirt but for the sleeves. Yes, if you are looking for really poofy pirate sleeves this shirt is awesome. However, I was looking to wear this more day-today as something under a corset or jacket. I could actually have dealt with the poofy sleeves but the main issue was with the elastic at the cuffs. Yes, there is elastic but it is so loose that the sleeves essentially just hang and cannot even be pushed up to the elbows to stay up. Overall, this looseness at the wrists made me feel like perhaps I had forgotten to button the sleeves and would have been quite annoying by the end of the day. I thought about adding a button/snap/additional elastic to tighten things up but decided against it. So, overall impression would be that the shirt itself was GREAT but for the sleeves. Kinda sad I had to return it.

The shirt came fast and fits like a glove on a hand. Every moment I wear it I feel like I'm in my fantasy world as my character I'm protraying. It streches to fit your figure quite nicely. (of course I got XS)
N/A

I purchased this blouse for a murder/mystery party.  For under $17, I didn't expect much.  Let me just say I was blown away by the quality of this blouse.  The material is thick and the cut provides an extremely flattering fit. I am 5' 5" and wear a size 4.  The small fit me well, leaving a bit of extra room to fit a size 6. I am thinking I may wear this thing for more than costume dress up! I would definitely buy it again.

I bought this for my teenage niece, who loves Victorian/ goth inspired clothing. The material is very nice. The bodice and sleeves are a sturdy cotton. The lower portion is has spandex, which gives it a smooth feel and some stretch. My niece is very petite, so the bottom hem hit around her hip area. The sleeves also went down to her wrists, and she must wear it on her shoulders. She's too petite to wear it off the shoulders, which would make the sleeves too long. The neckline is very pretty and flattering. It's versatile enough to be worn with jeans or dressed up with a nice skirt. She told me that the thing she likes most is that it looks dressy but is as comfortable as a tee shirt. I will definitely look into other items made by this clothing brand.

I tried it on as soon as I got it! I plan to wear it with some lolita dresses I'm ordering. I ordered the biggest size. My measurements: chest 46in, waist 43in, and hips 52in. I love how the material is silky and soft against the skin, and stretches and moves with me! I can hardly wait to try it out with the dresses coming to me! Recommend for sure!
